name: Linguo
description: Linguo. This contract trusts that the Arbitrator is honest and will not reenter or modify its costs during a call. The arbitrator must support appeal periods. Linguo is a decentralized platform where anyone can submit a document for translation and have it translated by freelancers. It has no platform fees and disputes about translation quality are handled by Kleros jurors.

eventDecorators.name: AppealContribution
eventDecorators.description: To be emitted when someone contributes to the appeal process.

parameterDecorators.name: _taskID
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the respective task.

parameterDecorators.name: _party
parameterDecorators.description: The party which received the contribution.

parameterDecorators.name: _contributor
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the contributor.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount contributed.

eventDecorators.name: HasPaidAppealFee
eventDecorators.description: To be emitted when the appeal fees of one of the parties are fully funded.

parameterDecorators.name: _taskID
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the respective task.

parameterDecorators.name: _party
parameterDecorators.description: The party that is fully funded.

eventDecorators.name: TaskAssigned
eventDecorators.description: To be emitted when a translator assigns a task to himself.

parameterDecorators.name: _taskID
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the assigned task.

parameterDecorators.name: _translator
parameterDecorators.description: The address that was assigned to the task.

parameterDecorators.name: _price
parameterDecorators.description: The task price at the moment it was assigned.

parameterDecorators.name: _timestamp
parameterDecorators.description: When the task was assigned.

eventDecorators.name: TaskCreated
eventDecorators.description: To be emitted when a new task is created.

parameterDecorators.name: _taskID
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the newly created task.

parameterDecorators.name: _requester
parameterDecorators.description: The address that created the task.

parameterDecorators.name: _timestamp
parameterDecorators.description: When the task was created.

eventDecorators.name: TaskResolved
eventDecorators.description: To be emitted when a task is resolved, either by the translation being accepted, the requester being reimbursed or a dispute being settled.

parameterDecorators.name: _taskID
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the respective task.

parameterDecorators.name: _reason
parameterDecorators.description: Short description of what caused the task to be solved. One of: 'translation-accepted' | 'requester-reimbursed' | 'dispute-settled'.

parameterDecorators.name: _timestamp
parameterDecorators.description: When the task was resolved.

eventDecorators.name: TranslationChallenged
eventDecorators.description: To be emitted when a translation is challenged.

parameterDecorators.name: _taskID
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the respective task.

parameterDecorators.name: _challenger
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the challenger.

parameterDecorators.name: _timestamp
parameterDecorators.description: When the task was challenged.

eventDecorators.name: TranslationSubmitted
eventDecorators.description: To be emitted when a translation is submitted.

parameterDecorators.name: _taskID
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the respective task.

parameterDecorators.name: _translator
parameterDecorators.description: The address that performed the translation.

parameterDecorators.name: _translatedText
parameterDecorators.description: A URI to the translated text.

parameterDecorators.name: _timestamp
parameterDecorators.description: When the translation was submitted.

functionDecorators.name: acceptTranslation
functionDecorators.description: Pays the translator for completed task if no one challenged the translation during the review period.

parameterDecorators.name: _taskID
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the task.

functionDecorators.name: amountWithdrawable
functionDecorators.description: Returns the sum of withdrawable wei from appeal rounds. This function is O(n), where n is the number of rounds of the task. This could exceed the gas limit, therefore this function should only be used for interface display and not by other contracts.

parameterDecorators.name: _taskID
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the associated task.

parameterDecorators.name: _beneficiary
parameterDecorators.description: The contributor for which to query.

returnDecorators.name: total
returnDecorators.description: The total amount of wei available to withdraw.

functionDecorators.name: assignTask
functionDecorators.description: Assigns a specific task to the sender. Requires a translator's deposit. Note that the deposit should be a little higher than the required value because of the price increase during the time the transaction is mined. The surplus will be reimbursed.

parameterDecorators.name: _taskID
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the task.

functionDecorators.name: batchRoundWithdraw
functionDecorators.description: Withdraws contributions of multiple appeal rounds at once. This function is O(n) where n is the number of rounds. This could exceed the gas limit, therefore this function should be used only as a utility and not be relied upon by other contracts.

parameterDecorators.name: _beneficiary
parameterDecorators.description: The address that made contributions.

parameterDecorators.name: _taskID
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the associated task.

parameterDecorators.name: _cursor
parameterDecorators.description: The round from where to start withdrawing.

parameterDecorators.name: _count
parameterDecorators.description: The number of rounds to iterate. If set to 0 or a value larger than the number of rounds, iterates until the last round.

functionDecorators.name: challengeTranslation
functionDecorators.description: Challenges the translation of a specific task. Requires challenger's deposit.

parameterDecorators.name: _taskID
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the task.

parameterDecorators.name: _evidence
parameterDecorators.description: A link to evidence using its URI. Ignored if not provided.

functionDecorators.name: changeArbitrationCostMultiplier
functionDecorators.description: Changes the multiplier for the arbitration cost part of the translators' deposit.

parameterDecorators.name: _arbitrationCostMultiplier
parameterDecorators.description: A new value of the multiplier for calculating translator's deposit. In basis points.

functionDecorators.name: changeChallengeMultiplier
functionDecorators.description: Changes the multiplier for challengers' deposit.

parameterDecorators.name: _challengeMultiplier
parameterDecorators.description: A new value of the multiplier for calculating challenger's deposit. In basis points.

functionDecorators.name: changeGovernor
functionDecorators.description: Changes the governor of this contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _governor
parameterDecorators.description: A new governor.

functionDecorators.name: changeLoserStakeMultiplier
functionDecorators.description: Changes the percentage of arbitration fees that must be paid as a fee stake by the party that lost the previous round.

parameterDecorators.name: _loserStakeMultiplier
parameterDecorators.description: A new value for the multiplier of the appeal cost that the party that lost the previous round has to pay. In basis points.

functionDecorators.name: changeReviewTimeout
functionDecorators.description: Changes the time allocated for the review phase.

parameterDecorators.name: _reviewTimeout
parameterDecorators.description: A new value of the time allotted for reviewing a translation. In seconds.

functionDecorators.name: changeSharedStakeMultiplier
functionDecorators.description: Changes the percentage of arbitration fees that must be paid by parties as a fee stake if there was no winner and loser in the previous round.

parameterDecorators.name: _sharedStakeMultiplier
parameterDecorators.description: A new value of the multiplier of the appeal cost in case where there was no winner/loser in previous round. In basis point.

functionDecorators.name: changeTranslationMultiplier
functionDecorators.description: Changes the multiplier for the task price part of translators' deposit.

parameterDecorators.name: _translationMultiplier
parameterDecorators.description: A new value of the multiplier for calculating translator's deposit. In basis points.

functionDecorators.name: changeWinnerStakeMultiplier
functionDecorators.description: Changes the percentage of arbitration fees that must be paid as a fee stake by the party that won the previous round.

parameterDecorators.name: _winnerStakeMultiplier
parameterDecorators.description: A new value of the multiplier of the appeal cost that the winner of the previous round has to pay. In basis points.

functionDecorators.name: createTask
functionDecorators.description: Creates a task based on provided details. Requires a value of maximum price to be deposited.

parameterDecorators.name: _deadline
parameterDecorators.description: The deadline for the translation to be completed.

parameterDecorators.name: _minPrice
parameterDecorators.description: A minimum price of the translation. In wei.

parameterDecorators.name: _metaEvidence
parameterDecorators.description: A URI of a meta-evidence object for task submission.

returnDecorators.name: taskID
returnDecorators.description: The ID of the created task.

functionDecorators.name: fundAppeal
functionDecorators.description: Takes up to the total amount required to fund a side of an appeal. Reimburses the rest. Creates an appeal if all sides are fully funded.

parameterDecorators.name: _taskID
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of challenged task.

parameterDecorators.name: _side
parameterDecorators.description: The party that pays the appeal fee.

functionDecorators.name: getChallengeValue
functionDecorators.description: Gets the deposit required for challenging the translation.

parameterDecorators.name: _taskID
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the task.

functionDecorators.name: getContributions
functionDecorators.description: Gets the contributions made by a party for a given round of appeal of a task.

parameterDecorators.name: _taskID
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the task.

parameterDecorators.name: _round
parameterDecorators.description: The position of the round.

parameterDecorators.name: _contributor
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the contributor.

functionDecorators.name: getDepositValue
functionDecorators.description: Gets the deposit required for self-assigning the task.

parameterDecorators.name: _taskID
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the task.

functionDecorators.name: getNumberOfRounds
functionDecorators.description: Gets the number of rounds of the specific task.

parameterDecorators.name: _taskID
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the task.

functionDecorators.name: getRoundInfo
functionDecorators.description: Gets the information on a round of a task.

parameterDecorators.name: _taskID
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the task.

parameterDecorators.name: _round
parameterDecorators.description: The round to be queried.

returnDecorators.name: paidFees
returnDecorators.description: The amount paid by each party in the round.

returnDecorators.name: hasPaid
returnDecorators.description: Whether or not a given party has paid the full fees for the round.

returnDecorators.name: feeRewards
returnDecorators.description: The amount of fees that will be available as rewards for the winner.

functionDecorators.name: getTaskCount
functionDecorators.description: Gets the total number of created tasks.

functionDecorators.name: getTaskParties
functionDecorators.description: Gets the addresses of parties of a specified task.

parameterDecorators.name: _taskID
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the task.

returnDecorators.name: parties
returnDecorators.description: The addresses of translator and challenger as [ZERO_ADDRESS, translator, challenger].

functionDecorators.name: getTaskPrice
functionDecorators.description: Gets the current price of a specified task.

parameterDecorators.name: _taskID
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the task.

functionDecorators.name: reimburseRequester
functionDecorators.description: Reimburses the requester if no one picked the task or the translator failed to submit the translation before deadline.

parameterDecorators.name: _taskID
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the task.

functionDecorators.name: rule
functionDecorators.description: Gives the ruling for a dispute. Can only be called by the arbitrator. The purpose of this function is to ensure that the address calling it has the right to rule on the contract and to invert the ruling in the case a party loses from lack of appeal fees funding.

parameterDecorators.name: _disputeID
parameterDecorators.description: ID of the dispute in the Arbitrator contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _ruling
parameterDecorators.description: Ruling given by the arbitrator. Note that 0 is reserved for "Refuse to arbitrate".

functionDecorators.name: submitEvidence
functionDecorators.description: Submit a reference to evidence. EVENT.

parameterDecorators.name: _taskID
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the task.

parameterDecorators.name: _evidence
parameterDecorators.description: A link to evidence using its URI.

functionDecorators.name: submitTranslation
functionDecorators.description: Submits translated text for a specific task.

parameterDecorators.name: _taskID
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the task.

parameterDecorators.name: _translation
parameterDecorators.description: A URI to the translated text.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawFeesAndRewards
functionDecorators.description: Withdraws contributions of appeal rounds. Reimburses contributions if no disputes were raised. If a dispute was raised, sends the fee stake rewards and reimbursements proportional to the contributions made to the winner of a dispute.

parameterDecorators.name: _beneficiary
parameterDecorators.description: The address that made contributions.

parameterDecorators.name: _taskID
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the associated task.

parameterDecorators.name: _round
parameterDecorators.description: The round from which to withdraw.
